edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.scrum_backlog

Class ScrumBacklogModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.scrum_backlog.ScrumBacklogModel

  • public class ScrumBacklogModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Concrete class that implements the Singleton design pattern. This class both maintains the TaskItemList and handles commands from the GUI, such as loading, saving, and creating new TaskItemLists.
    Author:
    Steven Mayo

      • saveTasksToFile

        public void saveTasksToFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Saves the current TaskItemList as an XML file with the specified filename parameter.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of the XML file to save the current TaskItemList to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the TaskItemList is null.

      • loadTasksFromFile

        public void loadTasksFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Attempts to load a TaskItemList from the specified XML filename.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename used to read from and populate the list of TaskItems.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if ScrumBacklogModel encounters a TaskIOException when attempting to read from the specified file.

      • createNewTaskItemList

        public void createNewTaskItemList()
        Creates a new TaskItemList.

      • getTaskItemListAsArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] getTaskItemListAsArray()
        Provides information to the GUI by returning a 2D Object array that is used to populate the TaskListTable with information.
        Returns:
        2D Object array containing 1 row and 3 columns for every TaskItem returned.

      • getTaskItemListByOwnerAsArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] getTaskItemListByOwnerAsArray(java.lang.String owner)
        Provides information to the GUI by returning a 2D Object array used to populate the TaskListTable with TaskItems filtered by the owner parameter.
        Parameters:
        owner - Name used to return information on TaskItems with only this specific value. with
        Returns:
        2D Object array containing a row for each TaskItem owned by the specified parameter There is a column entry for each TaskItem's id number, state name, and title.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified parameter is null.

      • getTaskItemListByCreatorAsArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] getTaskItemListByCreatorAsArray(java.lang.String creator)
        Provides information to the GUI by returning a 2D Object array used to populate the TaskListTable with TaskItems filtered by the owner parameter.
        Parameters:
        creator - Name used to return information on TaskItems with only this specific creator name. the 2D Object value. the TaskItem
        Returns:
        2D Object array containing a row for each TaskItem created by the specified parameter. There is a column entry for each TaskItem's id number, state name, and title.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified parameter is null.

        Parameters:
